title: Welcome To My Blog
text:
This is the first post in a Quarto blog. Welcome!

Since this post doesn’t specify an explicit image, the first image in the post will be used in the listing page of posts.

title: dfdf
text:
import pandas as pd
house=pd.read_csv('korea_house_data.csv', encoding='cp949')
house
house.head(20)
house.tail(20)
house.sort_values(by=['행정구역별(읍면동)', '시점'])
house.sort_values(by=['시점','일반가구_계'], ascending= False)
house[house.시점==2021].sort_values(by='일반가구_계', ascending=False)

house
#정렬을 해도 원자료는 바뀌지 않음 ㄹㅇㄹㅇ 바꾸고 싶으면 저장하든가
house.drop(columns=['일반가구_계'],inplace=True) #다만, 복구는 불가하니 삭제는 지양할 것
house[house['행정구역별(읍면동)']=='전국'].index
house.drop(index=house[house['행정구역별(읍면동)']=='전국'].index,
           inplace=True)
house
house.reset_index(drop=True, inplace=True)
house.rename(columns={"시점":"year",
                      "행정구역별(읍면동)":"region"},
             inplace=True)
house.columns=['region', 'year', '1인', '2인', '3인', '4인', '5인', '6인', '7인 이상']
house.to_csv("/content/drive/MyDrive/house_final.csv",
             sep=',', header=True, index= False,encoding='utf-8-sig')






FileNotFoundError: ignored



del_idx=house[house['region'].isin(["읍부","면부","동부"])].index
house.drop(index=del_idx, inplace=True)
house.reset_index(drop=True, inplace=True)
house


house.to_csv("/content/drive/MyDrive/house_final2.csv",
             sep=',', header=True, index= False,encoding='utf-8-sig')

weather['avg_t_minmax']=(weather['max_t']+weather['min_t'])/2

import random

def prime(number):
    if number < 2:
        return False
    for i in range(2, int(number)):
        if number % i == 0:
            return False
    return True

def range_sosu(min_num, max_num):
    primes = []
    for number in range(min_num, max_num + 1):
        if prime(number):
            primes.append(number)
    return primes

def rand_sosu(min_num, max_num):
    primes = range_sosu(min_num, max_num)
    return len(primes) / (max_num - min_num + 1)

def prob_sosu(min_num, max_num):
    count = 0
    for number in range(min_num, max_num + 1):
        if range_sosu(number):
            count += 1
    return count / (max_num - min_num + 1)

# [1] 소수 판단 함수 테스트
number = 20
print(prime(number))

# [2] 주어진 범위 내의 소수 출력
print(range_sosu(150, 300))


# [3] 경험적 확률 계산
print(rand_sosu)

# [4] 논리적 확률과 경험적 확률 비교


def prob_sosu(min, max, trials):
    count_prime = 0
    for _ in range(trials):
        number = random.randint(min, max)
        if prime(number):
            count_prime += 1
    return count_prime / trials
